cause.description:
Global warming, oil depletion, war, hunger, disease. All of these are social situations that can destroy our way of life. All of these are real problems with scientific solutions. Estimates place the cost of the Iraq war between $1 and $2 Trillion, and Americans didn't give a second thought to shelling out $155 million in the opening week of the fifth Harry Potter movie, so why can't we start spending more on Scientific research?
1. Science works
2. Science will save us
cause.name: Save the World Through Radical Scientific Breakthroughs
